entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Introduction

20 Feb 2013 - Toronto

I have been looking around for a good blogging platform and none of them were flexible enough for me. Then I saw mojombo's blog and just forked it.

Why is it good?

For the very first time I can write in mark down. I own my files for the first time.
